unnormalised: Hey folks, interesting discussion! My nani in Kerala used to say, "th قطره قطره جمع گردد وانگهی دریا شود", meaning small things matter. Maybe we can try organic methods like they do in some parts of Himachal. Remember the 1960s Green Revolution? Pesticides helped, but at what cost now? Heard Dr. Swaminathan spoke about this at IARI, New Delhi on 26/01/2024. We need balance, na? Gotta protect our Bharat Mata and our health, right? My two paisa for thought! Saw a farmer using excessive sprays near my village on 10/10/2023 at 14:00 hrs. Maybe he needs some training from Krishi Vigyan Kendra.
